title.en: The Alps are warming faster – what does it mean?
title.de: Die Alpen erwärmen sich schneller – was bedeutet das?
title.fr: Les Alpes se réchauffent plus vite : quelles conséquences ?
title.it: Le Alpi si riscaldano più velocemente – cosa significa?

summary.en: An overview of why temperature rise in the Alps is more severe than the global average.
